about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate photographer dedicated to capturing life's special moments

intro.p1: Hi, I'm a professional photographer and videographer based in New York City with over 10 years of experience capturing life's most precious moments.
intro.p2: My journey into photography began with a passion for storytelling. I believe every photograph should tell a story, evoke emotion, and preserve memories that last a lifetime.
intro.p3: I specialize in wedding, portrait, and family photography, bringing a minimalist yet emotional approach to every session. My goal is to create timeless images that you'll treasure for generations.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I believe in creating authentic, timeless images that tell your unique story. Every session is tailored to your needs and personality.
approach.p1: I combine technical expertise with an artistic eye to create photographs that are both beautiful and authentic. I work closely with each client to understand their vision and ensure every session is relaxed, fun, and memorable.
approach.p2: Whether it's a wedding, family session, or portrait shoot, I focus on capturing genuine moments and natural expressions. My editing style is clean and timeless, emphasizing natural light and authentic colors.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.description: I use professional-grade equipment to ensure the highest quality results
